put.description: Create a named template deployment using a template.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

id.description: Gets or sets the ID of the deployment.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the deployment.

correlationId.description: Gets or sets the correlation ID of the deployment.

dependencies.description: Gets the list of deployment dependencies.

id.description: Gets or sets the ID of the dependency.

resourceName.description: Gets or sets the dependency resource name.

resourceType.description: Gets or sets the dependency resource type.

id.description: Gets or sets the ID of the dependency.

resourceName.description: Gets or sets the dependency resource name.

resourceType.description: Gets or sets the dependency resource type.

mode.description: Gets or sets the deployment mode.

outputs.description: Gets or sets key/value pairs that represent deployment output.

parameters.description: Deployment parameters. Use only one of Parameters or ParametersLink.

parametersLink.description: Gets or sets the URI referencing the parameters. Use only one of Parameters or ParametersLink.

contentVersion.description: If included it must match the ContentVersion in the template.

providers.description: Gets the list of resource providers needed for the deployment.

id.description: Gets or sets the provider id.

namespace.description: Gets or sets the namespace of the provider.

registrationState.description: Gets or sets the registration state of the provider.

resourceTypes.description: Gets or sets the collection of provider resource types.

items.description: Resource type managed by the resource provider.

apiVersions.description: Gets or sets the api version.

locations.description: Gets or sets the collection of locations where this resource type can be created in.

resourceType.description: Gets or sets the resource type.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the state of the provisioning.

template.description: Gets or sets the template content. Use only one of Template or TemplateLink.

templateLink.description: Gets or sets the URI referencing the template. Use only one of Template or TemplateLink.

timestamp.description: Gets or sets the timestamp of the template deployment.
